Chapters


End Cards


This is a list of volumes of the manga adaptation of Bakemonogatari by Oh! Great. Since March 14th, 2018, each chapters has been first published in Weekly Sh≈çnen Magazine with a special end card to promote the manga. As of May 2021, there are 128 chapters published and 13 volumes on sale in Japan.[1][2]
Each Japanese volume has a special edition that includes:

The original manga with a new full-red cover.
A Monster Gallery (which corresponds to a certain number of colorized end cards related to the published chapters in the volume).
A new short (short) story by Nisio Isin.[3][4]
